text: Gumazir dapanir kaba, me Mikaian akam baregha, Baruk iniasa gumazir mam amada. Gumazir kamɨn ziam, Jehudi, a Netanian otarim, egha Selemian igiavotarim, ezɨ Selemia, a Kusin otarim. Ezɨ Jehudi ghua kamaghɨn Baruk mɨgei, “Nɨ akɨnafarir gumazamiziba bagha dɨponezir kam inigh, egh nɨ izi.” Ezɨ Baruk akɨnafarir kam inigha, gumazir dapaniba bagha ize.
